attributes.action: prevent the usa from forcing gary mckinnon to be tried in usa for hacking into the pentagon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: he is very clever and we should be embracing his talent for improving the security of the uk not allowing america the opportunity to lock him up for 60 years where there is every chance he will commit suicide

rejection.details: The Home Secretary does not have general discretion in this case. He can only stop extradition if he finds that McKinnon’s human rights would be breached.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
